name: BURNOUT (itch) (mrkos, WinstonWalrus)
description:
Dash and weave through hordes of enemy polygons, and upgrade your bullet in this fast-paced arcade action game!

In BURNOUT, you're the bullet, and you've got one shot.

Click and drag to shoot your character. Hit an enemy, and you can do it again. Miss, and you die. Destroy enough enemies, and you can upgrade a stat. More instructions in-game.

This is our second ever game jam and we're really happy with how BURNOUT ended up, and we hope you are too!

Made in three days for ScoreSpace Jam 15 with the theme 'One Bullet' and an extra challenge of 'upgrades'.

  • Future Renaissance; Calm Cosmos; Mystery - Wee Free Music

Mac version is still untested so if your computer becomes a burning pile of hellfire we certainly didn't know that'd happen

Also we're aware the music cuts out if you click away from the tab, unfortunately, we don't have the time on our hands to fix that, but luckily the FX audio stays so you still get that sweet sweet boom
